Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Comment: The options for the operation. May be null, in which case defaults will be supplied.

Options.Name: pollSettings
Options.Comment: The settings to control how often and long the job is fetched before timing out if it is still incomplete. May be null, in which case defaults will be supplied.

Comments.returns: The final state of the job.

Parameter.Name: destinationUris
Parameter.Comment: The Google Cloud Storage URIs (possibly including a wildcard) to extract the data to. Must not be null or empty.

Comments.summary: Creates a job to extract data from the specified BigQuery table to Google Cloud Storage. See [the BigQuery documentation](https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/exporting-data) for more information on extract jobs.
Comments.returns: The job created for the extract operation.
